description: Finalize and merge the documentation feature branch

userStories.title: Fix Jest dependency issue
acceptanceCriteria: Run npm install to fix missing @jridgewell/set-array
npm test passes without module errors
userStories.notes: Jest is failing due to missing dependency. Run npm install to resolve.

userStories.title: Add unit tests for documentation generator
acceptanceCriteria: Test error handling for API failures
userStories.notes: New documentation code in src/documentation/ needs test coverage

userStories.title: Add unit tests for handbook generator
userStories.notes: The handbook-generator.ts creates the human-readable markdown output

userStories.title: Add unit tests for CLI document-environment
userStories.notes: CLI tool in src/cli/document-environment.ts needs test coverage

userStories.title: Clean up root status markdown files
acceptanceCriteria: Remove SETUP_ENV.md if content is in other docs
Root directory has minimal markdown files
userStories.notes: Too many status files in root. Consolidate into docs/ folder.

userStories.title: Update README with documentation feature
acceptanceCriteria: Include npm run document:env usage examples
Link to detailed docs in docs/ folder
userStories.notes: README needs to mention the new documentation capabilities

userStories.title: Commit all documentation feature changes
acceptanceCriteria: Stage all new and modified files
All changes committed to documentme branch
git status shows clean working tree
userStories.notes: Organize changes into logical commits: core generator, CLI tool, tests, docs

userStories.title: Create pull request to main
acceptanceCriteria: PR summary lists all new features
userStories.notes: Final step - create PR for review
